duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage general civil litigation cases, including defending commercial disputes, personal injury lawsuits, and premises liability actions in State Court.
Prepare pleadings, motions, and briefs, manage discovery, prepare for depositions, and conduct legal research and writing.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Proficient in Microsoft Word, Outlook, Excel, and e-discovery platforms.
Handle multiple priorities in a professional manner and have excellent writing, research, negotiation, and communication skills.

education_certification.credential: CA Bar Admission required, NV Bar Admission preferred
